name: The Blood Crystal
description:
A threat to the entire multiverse! That’s what the blood crystal is.  An object made with dimensional rift energy.  Delax is the catalyst for the blood crystal to be activated,  And you, Kenya Maxwell,  have the power to stop the destruction of all worlds.

Travel to the edge of the world and jump into the rift that has opened there. Travel through Delax, also known as the ageless dimension and recover the crystal; no matter what.

Good Luck Agent; Mission Start.
